Home → Events and activities → Summer holiday activities for children → Summer holiday activities

Summer holiday activities

We’ve got lots of children’s events taking place across our libraries over the summer holidays. Contact your local library to find out about any additional events they have planned.

We’re also running the Summer Reading Challenge for 4-11 year-olds. Why not sign up for our Summer Reading Challenge newsletter or find your next read with our children’s book recommendations?
